mapper.select: SELECT rp.REQUIRE_POINT_ID AS requirePointId, rp.REQUIRE_POINT_DESC AS requirePointDesc, rp.SYSTEM_ID AS systemId, rp.DIRECTORY_ID AS directoryId, rp.REQUIRE_POINT_TYPE AS requirePointType, rp.REVIEW_STATUS AS reviewStatus, rp.ANALYSIS_METHOD AS analysisMethod, rp.REQUIRE_STATUS AS requireStatus, rp.DESIGNER_ID AS designerId, rp.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, rp.MODIFIER_ID AS modifierId, rp.MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime, rp.REMARK AS remark, rp.SEND_TEST_ID AS sendTestId, rp.WORK_PACKAGE_ID AS workPackageId FROM tf_usecase_require ur LEFT JOIN tf_requirepoint rp ON ur.REQUIRE_POINT_ID = rp.REQUIRE_POINT_ID WHERE ur.USECASE_ID = #{usecaseId} ORDER BY rp.CREATE_TIME DESC
